location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'The Ashar Creek Basra.' Photographer: Wilfrid Malleson

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:130 x 193 mm; 129 x 195 mmCondition:The prints are in good condition with minor transfer from opposite printe page and surface dirt throughout. Some light foxing and creasing at edges.Foliation:‘23’

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View of the Ashar Creek at Basra. At least seven canoes and one larger sailing boat are moored at centre and right. In the background two-storey buildings and palms recede into the distance.Inscriptions:Ink, alongside image at right: 'The Ashar Creek Basra.'
